General.Name: Applicad Public Company Limited
General.Description: Applicad Public Company Limited engages in the sale of computer programs in Thailand and Indonesia. It operates through three segments: Computer Software Sales Division; Sale Division of Machinery, Equipment and Other Products; and Service Division. The company offers 2D/3D CAD, 3D printers, 3D scanners, animation and rendering, BIM, CAD, CAM, CAD viewer, cloud platform, communication design, multimedia and documents, project management, simulation and checker, and other products. It also provides maintenance services for computer programs; and machines and equipment to design and develop other related products, as well as sells machinery, computer parts, spare parts, materials, and other products. The company was incorporated in 1994 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
